pr_title: [JBPM-9321] Some form options can't be rendered in API response / DocumentCollection

timeline.message:
[JBPM-9321] Some form options can't be rendered in API response

Add DocumentCollection input

type.contains("Date") is already covered in a previous else-if statement, no needed here.

Suggested change
} else if (type.contains("Document") || type.contains("documentCollection") || type.contains("Date")) {

replies.author: afalhambra

timeline.body:
`static final` members should be named all uppercase, with components separated by underscore "_" characters

`Arrays.asList("documentCollection");` can be replace with `singletonList`
```suggestion
    public static final List<String> FIELDS_EXCLUSION_TRANSFORMATION = Collections.singletonList("documentCollection");
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
static final members should be named all uppercase, with components separated by underscore "_" characters

Arrays.asList("documentCollection"); can be replace with singletonList

Suggested change
public static final List<String> fieldsExclusionTransformation = Arrays.asList("documentCollection");
public static final List<String> FIELDS_EXCLUSION_TRANSFORMATION = Collections.singletonList("documentCollection");
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.bodyHTML:
typo

Suggested change
DocumentCollection<Document> docColletion = (DocumentCollection<Document>) value;
DocumentCollection<Document> docCollection = (DocumentCollection<Document>) value;
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.body:
this could throw a `ClassCastException` when there is no binding defined or there is no actual document attached to the form (attached documents can be empty).

https://github.com/kiegroup/droolsjbpm-integration/blob/85030fa786bdc5775b1bd91bf0921f14c95c8d6d/kie-server-parent/kie-server-services/kie-server-services-jbpm-ui/src/main/java/org/kie/server/services/jbpm/ui/form/render/AbstractFormRenderer.java#L401-L406
timeline.bodyHTML:
this could throw a ClassCastException when there is no binding defined or there is no actual document attached to the form (attached documents can be empty).

droolsjbpm-integration/kie-server-parent/kie-server-services/kie-server-services-jbpm-ui/src/main/java/org/kie/server/services/jbpm/ui/form/render/AbstractFormRenderer.java

Lines 401 to 406 in 85030fa

if (inputs.get(field.getBinding()) != null) {
value = inputs.get(field.getBinding());
}
if (outputs.get(field.getBinding()) != null) {
value = outputs.get(field.getBinding());
}
timeline.author: afalhambra

replies.bodyText:
you setup this wrong. The type of the field should be org.jbpm.document.DocumentCollection
and it should be binded to a document collection. Otherwise it is not possible to make it work.
I am adding a instanceof check anyway.
replies.author: elguardian

timeline.bodyHTML:
item.getValue().equals("{}") may throw a NPE

Suggested change
if (("file".equals(fieldType) || "documentCollection".equals(fieldType)) && !item.getValue().equals("{}")) {
if (("file".equals(fieldType) || "documentCollection".equals(fieldType)) && !"".equals(item.getValue())) {
timeline.author: afalhambra
